comments.body: Does this show any warnings? If not, let's don't do this. It will make difficult to maintain e.g.) backporting or revert but the gain is just cosmetic stuffs

Thank you, @sarutak . I also confirmed this bug in 3.0.0-rc1.
BTW, 2.4.6-rc1 seems to have no problem. Do you know why we don't have this issue in 2.4.x?

I think the reason is that the response header contains `X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff` for `master` and `3.0.0-rc1` while not for `2.4.x`.
```
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
Date: Wed, 13 May 2020 08:31:43 GMT
Content-Length: 1638
Server: Jetty(9.3.27.v20190418)
```

`X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff` means that the content type should be defined by `Content-Type` header, and it seems to be introduced to `3.0.x` in #23302 for security.
